name: ListExtensionSchemas
description:
Retrieve all PagerDuty extension schemas.

Use this tool to list all extension schemas available in PagerDuty, representing different types of outbound extensions like Generic Webhook, Slack, and ServiceNow. Useful for integrating with or understanding existing extension capabilities within PagerDuty.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the API response. Used for versioning with the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: set_content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type of the request. Use 'application/json' for JSON format.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to display per page when listing extension schemas.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset to begin paginated search results. Provide an integer to specify the starting point in the data.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: include_total_in_pagination
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total number of results in the pagination response. Set to false for faster response times.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.
